KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Number var 001
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: range kurtosis skew stdev stdevp varp
KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords: standard deviation variance distribution sample curve displacement mean

Example.Description: This example defines the values of a population sample in the argument list. The stdev function computes the variance of the sample values.

Syntax.Note: Computes the variance of 6 sample popluation values.
